articles.author: Jimmy Hascup
articles.title: Michael Jordan could've been a major leaguer if former A's general manager had his wish - USA TODAY
articles.description: Longtime baseball executive Sandy Alderson, former A's GM, said to ESPN that he wanted to sign Michael Jordan to major league deal when he left NBA.
articles.content:
SportsPulse: Former Chicago Bulls teammate B.J. Armstrong breaks down the first two episodes of "The Last Dance" and explains why Michael Jordan's criticism of his teammates was only the "PG" version.
USA TODAY

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/tomecurran
articles.title: Curran: Trading up to get Tua would be an uncharacteristic mistake - NBCSports.com
articles.description: There has been significant chatter ahead of this week's NFL Draft that the Patriots might be willing to move up in order to select Tua Tagovailoa. As our Tom E. Curran writes, that would be uncharacteristic and a big mistake.
articles.content:
If youre a Patriots fan praying for a speedy, post-Brady recovery, hit your knees and pray somebody in the Top 10 takes Tua Tagovailoa. 
Because if nobody does and the Patriots trade up to get him as weve been talking about nonstop for a month? 
They will b… [+5069 chars]

articles.title: Liverpool Premier League title hopes boosted by Serie A plan - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Liverpool are waiting to discover the fate of their Premier League title challenge
articles.content:
Liverpool's hopes of playing out the remainder of their Premier League campaign have been handed a boost after Serie A teams agreed their season should be completed.
